articles.description: Donald Trump's tax plans call for preserving the 2017 tax cuts that helped every income group and boosted the economy, while Kamala Harris aims to spike taxes, crippling the economy, even as her spending reignites inflation. Which makes the choice between them clear.

No one is more eager to cut taxes than Trump.
